title: Boston Level Two Marathon Training Plan
description: Level Two (Novice to intermediate) is designed around running an average of five days per week. This plan targets a mileage progression starting at 30 miles per week and goes up to 45 miles per week during peak mileage weeks. Additionally, long runs go up to 18-20 miles.
